task.title: Opening a Document When No Template Was Found

context.p: If Serna fails to guess the document type on opening a document, the message that no document template matched the document will appear.
In this case, do one of the following:

step.cmd: If you are opening a document type unknown to Serna, use the Default template.
step.stepresult: Serna will open the document with the default template.

step.cmd: If you are opening a document type known to Serna, use the appropriate template.
step.stepresult: The Choose Document Template Dialog will appear, where you can explicitly choose the document category and template.
